llm_topic_proposal_raw.motivation: The article discusses the Model Context Protocol (MCP), which standardizes AI system integrations and is crucial for understanding the macro implications of AI in organizational processes, warranting a dedicated node.

topic_category.motivation: Standardizes AI integration, driving AI adoption across industries.
